verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) <S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H7130>within<s%> me, [bless] His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> And <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H408>none<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of His <S%H1576>benefits;<s%>
Who <S%H5545>pardons<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquities;<s%> Who <S%H7495>heals<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8463>diseases;<s%>
Who <S%H1350>redeems<s%> your <S%H9132>life<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit;<s%> Who <S%H5849>crowns<s%> you with <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H7356>compassion;<s%>
Who <S%H7646>satisfies<s%> your <S%H5716>years<s%> with <S%H9185>good<s%> <S%H9185>things,<s%> [So that] your <S%H5271>youth<s%> is <S%H2318>renewed<s%> like the <S%H5404>eagle.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>performs<s%> <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H6666>deeds,<s%> And <S%H4941>judgments<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> who are <S%H6231>oppressed.<s%>
He <S%H3045>made<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> His <S%H1870>ways<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> His <S%H5949>acts<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7349>compassionate<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious,<s%> <S%H750>Slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H7227>abounding<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness.<s%>
He will not <S%H5331>always<s%> <S%H7378>strive<s%> [with us]; <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will He <S%H5201>keep<s%> [His anger] <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
He has not <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with us according to our <S%H2399>sins,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> us according to our <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>

For as <S%H1361>high<s%> as the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> So <S%H1396>great<s%> is His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him.
As <S%H7368>far<s%> as the <S%H4217>east<s%> is from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> So <S%H7368>far<s%> has He <S%H7368>removed<s%> our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> from us.
Just as a father <S%H1>has<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on [his] <S%H7355>children,<s%> So the <S%H1121>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>has<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on those who <S%H7355>fear<s%> Him.
For He <S%H1931>Himself<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> our <S%H3336>frame;<s%> He is <S%H2142>mindful<s%> that we are [but] <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
As for <S%H582>man,<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> are like <S%H2682>grass;<s%> As a <S%H6731>flower<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he <S%H6692>flourishes.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> has <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> it, it is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>more;<s%> And its <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5234>acknowledges<s%> it <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer.<s%>

But the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> on those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him, And His <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to <S%H1121>children<s%>'s children,
To those who <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> And who <S%H2142>remember<s%> His <S%H6490>precepts<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3559>established<s%> His <S%H3678>throne<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> And His <S%H4438>sovereignty<s%> <S%H4910>rules<s%> over <S%H3605>all.<s%>

<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> you His <S%H4397>angels,<s%> <S%H1368>Mighty<s%> in <S%H3581>strength,<s%> who <S%H6213>perform<s%> His <S%H1697>word,<s%> <S%H8085>Obeying<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of His <S%H1697>word!<s%>
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you His <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> You who <S%H8334>serve<s%> Him, <S%H6213>doing<s%> His <S%H7522>will.<s%>

<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H4639>works<s%> of His, In <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4725>places<s%> of His <S%H4475>dominion;<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul!<s%>
